channel.title: You may want to fix this
channel.description:
When a mod or admin moves a moparscape topic from this site it still give you the moparisthebest url. This is what i mean.
This topic has been moved to MoparScape Questions. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=54679.0
Moparscape question is on moparisthebest.com/smf so you my want to fix this. -InXile

item.title: You may want to fix this
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“SSG Thor, post:6, topic:38861”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=54702.msg678491#msg678491 date=1166996211]

That is all but impossible, maybe make a sticky to say if it is a dead link like that replace the moparisthebest.com with moparisthebest.com and it will work. Probably noone would read it though.

That is what you have to do, no other way around it sorry.
[/quote]

It’s possible.
Just add a check: If the board moved to is any of the moparscape boards, simply change the URL displayed.[/quote]

No, because the fusion between the two Forums Sites prevents that from happening. Those links generated by the server are using strings that are preset through Settings.php and called on through the Sources PHP files. In other words…

moparisthebest:

no other way around it sorry.

Read full topic
item.source: You may want to fix this

item.title: You may want to fix this
item.dc:creator: @SSG_Thor SSG Thor
item.description:
@SSG_Thor wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:3, topic:38861”][quote author=Mmmk link=topic=54702.msg677884#msg677884 date=1166988230]
That is all but impossible, maybe make a sticky to say if it is a dead link like that replace the moparisthebest.com with moparisthebest.com and it will work. Probably noone would read it though.
[/quote]

That is what you have to do, no other way around it sorry.[/quote]

It’s possible.
Just add a check: If the board moved to is any of the moparscape boards, simply change the URL displayed.

Read full topic
